descriptionMarkdown:
Step 1: connect a cable from the station to the far left Arithmetic Combinator and set station to **Read train contents**  
Step 2: inside the right combinator set the constant value to **a = 'wagon size' * '# of wagons' * 'item stack size'** (for example a train with 4 wagons holding iron ore would be a = 40 * 4 * 50 = 8,000)  
  
Counter reads in digital display format, can work with other mods such as [Supersonic High Speed Train Mod](https://mods.factorio.com/mod/fast_trans).  
Mods: [SantasNixieTubeDisplay](https://mods.factorio.com/mod/SantasNixieTubeDisplay) & [Text Plates](https://mods.factorio.com/mod/textplates)  
  
```(Each*100)/(a)=x%, where 'a' = wagon size * # of wagons * item stack size```
title: Train Percentage Counter (Modded)
